Name: Finding America: The Heartland
About the game: Welcome to America's Heartland! From the monumental Mount Rushmore of South Dakota to the humble farmhouses of Kansas, we're confident this lovely slice of American pie will have something just for you. Now let's go see the many beautiful things the Heartland has to offer! 30 Hidden Object scenes, with 2 mini-Hidden Object scenes each 54 minigames 54 chapters Strap on your seatbelts, because we're going on a trip to America's Heartland! This isn't any ordinary road trip, though: every sight and scene — from Illinois' jazz bars to Wisconsin's cheese shops to Ohio's national parks — comes in the form of lovingly crafted Hidden Object Scenes and Minigames! Complete each chapter, unlock tons of different trivia, and enjoy everything the Heartland has to offer in this all-American Hidden Object game!
